abstract: Season 2 Eps. 6-9 (Each episode runs for 23 mins.) Ep. 6 Your cheating heart--Ep. 7 Basketball diaries--Ep. 8 Who wants to be a millionaire?--Ep. 9 Sabretooth
description: Episode of Series "Crash zone". Episode 6: Marcello alienates himself from the team when he uses a 'cheat' website to help him beat Bec in the school essay contest. Episode 7: After Bec returns from a trip to Silicon Valley in the USA, her cocky too-cool-for-school attitude threatens the effectiveness of the team. Episode 8: Marcello's latest scheme, a "virtual band", takes off and he becomes, on paper at least, a millionaire. But has he really hit the big time? Episode 9: A famous hacker steals Alex's new game. When Marcello realises the hacker is someone he knows he has to make a difficult decision. Cast includes Paul Pantano, Cassandra Magrath, Nikolai Nikolaeff, Frances Wang, Damien Bodie, Nicki Wendt and Matthew Parkinson. Teaching resources can be found at: http://www.actf.com.au/learning_centre_new/Learning_frameset.htm Accompanying website at: www.crashzone.tv
